morefusion.machine.fusion_reactor_mf.hol: Hold CTRL to display the value without a prefix.
morefusion.multiblock.fusion_reactor_mf_: The [MF] Fusion Reactor MK %s is a large multiblock structure used for fusing elements into heavier ones. It can only use higher or equal %s Energy Hatch(es). For every Hatch it has, its buffer increases by %s EU, and has a maximum of %s.
